title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Internet-Based Video Program for Enhancing Pharmacists' Roles in Public Health

context.prior_knowledge: Basic public health concepts and pharmaceutical practice experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can produce a 3-minute video summarizing key disease prevention information in public health.
Learners can effectively communicate pharmacists' public health roles to the community through public service announcement-style videos.
Learners can enhance the professionalism and delivery of video content through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
